    • Endpoint

      public Endpoint(Socket socket, boolean serverSide) throws IOException
      Default constructor
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket
      serverSide - true if the endpoint is for the server, false if it's for the client
      Throws:
      IOException - signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred
